scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a rural harvest with figures engaged in agricultural labor. In the foreground, a person in a red tunic and dark hat carries sheaves of wheat towards a team of two donkeys laden with sacks. Behind them, a cart filled with hay is being loaded by a figure in a blue tunic and red cap, holding a pitchfork. The background shows a rolling landscape with trees and a building with a tiled roof and a tall chimney. Above the scene, a calendar page is visible with Latin text, indicating a specific month and liturgical entries. The sun is depicted in the upper sky as a brown orb within a golden halo.
